department: Innovation, Sciences et Développement économique Canada
full_summary:
================================

### Solicitation for Programmer Analyst Services

**Title:**

* Programmer Analyst (English)
* Programmeur/Analyste (French)

**Reference Number:** cb-7230-19212241

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-14

**Closing Date:** 2023-07-28, 2:00 PM ET

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering

**Description:**

A competitive tendering process is initiated to obtain a Programmer Analyst services to assist Innovation Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) in providing information technology consultation services.

**Key Details:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 14, 2024
* **Region of Opportunity**: Ottawa
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Note:**

This solicitation was not subject to a limited tendering process.

**Trade Agreements Affected:**

This notice is impacted by several trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Heidi Gagne
ISED
(343) 542-9135

**Document Attached:**

Please see the attached PDF file for complete solicitation details:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7230/npp-ic207783.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7230/apm-ic207783_0.pdf (French)

Note: All information is subject to change. Please refer to the attached documents for the most recent and accurate information. 

End.  #####
